job.title: Front End Software Engineer
job.description: pFounded in 2016 by childhood friends and business partners Ryan Hogan and Derrick Smith Hunt A Killer is a fastgrowing entertainment company disrupting conventional storytelling by delivering immersive interactive entertainment experiences to over 100000 subscribers worldwidenbspppbrppHunt A Killer started as a single event that blended the concepts of escape rooms interactive theater and live entertainment by engaging participants in a 200acre living crime scene From that first foray into entertainment we learned invaluable lessons including how to truly immerse our audience in our experiences and the importance of learning from our audience In October 2016 Hunt A Killer launched our flagship monthly subscription box to 56 subscribers Hunt A Killer has continued to learn and grow evolving its products and distribution model to double our business yearoveryear Today we ship 150000 episodic and complete mystery game boxes direct to consumers each month and sell purposebuilt games through retail channels In 2019 Hunt A Killer was named one of Fast Companys Worlds Most Innovative Companies and in 2020 we placed 6th in the INC 5000 FastestGrowing CompaniesppbrppHunt A Killer is now working on additional ways to distribute our revolutionary content including licensing and digital channels to immerse more people in our stories With this in mind and a course set for the horizon we continue building a diverse team of creative decisionmakers because together we can do anythingppbrppHunt A Killer is committed to bringing together individuals from different backgrounds and perspectives We strive to create an inclusive environment where everyone can thrive feel a sense of belonging and do great work togethernbspOur goal is to build a great team  with a great team we can accomplish anythingppbrppstrongABOUT THE ROLEstrongppWe are seeking a FrontEnd Engineer to join the Technology team who will have responsibilities across the full software development lifecycle You will be primarily focused on development using frameworks and tools such as ASPNET Core and ReactJS Development activities include working with business SMEs to understand requirements and working with likeminded team members to apply best practices such as SOA Agile and TDDBDD to daily development activitiesppbrppstrongLOCATIONstrongppWe encourage candidates in near both strongBaltimore MDstrong and strongSeattle WAstrong to applyppbrppstrongYOURE THRILLED ABOUT THIS ROLE BECAUSE YOU WILLstrongpulliLove solving problems have a love for programming and enjoy working in a small team environmentliliBe constantly thinking of ways to use to code to make products and processes betterliliBe constantly focused on finding the right solutions for some of the most challenging problemsliliRally the team around you to keep pushing when everyone throws their hands in the air in frustration  because after all it takes a team to launch things successfully And of course working at a gaming company is a big plus for youliulpbrppstrongWERE THRILLED TO WELCOME YOU TO THE TEAM BECAUSE YOU HAVEstrongpulliA BS or MS degree in Computer Science Information Technology or related field from an accredited college or universityliliMinimum of 3 years of experience in manymost of the following skills C amp NET Framework andor NET Core ASPNET MVC 40 amp 50 Web API 20 HTML5 with Razor Entity Framework MSSQL Entity Framework React React Native vanilla JavaScript and PHPliliework MSSQL Entity Framework React React Native vanilla JavaScript and PHPliliSufficient experience developing and deploying applications in AzureliliRESTful web services development and integration experienceliliDemonstrated proficiency working on development platforms using multiple programming languagesliliDemonstrated proficiency working on development platforms using multiple programming languagesliliThe ability to pick up new technologies quicklyliliA high comfortable level of experience with source control solutions such as GitGitHubliliStrong analytical and problemsolving skillsliliExcellent written and oral communication skillsliliThe ability to identify and communicate potential issues while determining solutionsliliExcellent development estimation skillsliliDemonstrated understanding of development standards and expectations for deliverablesliliThe ability to adapt to and embrace new situations changing priorities and emerging technologiesliliThe ability to work on teams with diverse skills backgroundsliliMust have the ability to work under pressure but continue to think clearly and provide support or guidance to team members during challenging projects and schedulesliliDemonstrated proficiency working collaboratively with lesstechnical teams across the software development life cycleliulpbrppstrongYOULL LOVE HUNT A KILLER BECAUSE WEstrongpulliAre passionate about innovations in entertainment and are obsessed with member satisfactionliliOffer competitive compensation comprehensive health dental and vision and 401k with matchingliliBelieve in time off and encourage as muchliliSolve complex problems on a daily basisliulpbrppHunt A Killer is an EOE MFDVp
